attributes.action: CHEAPER CAR INSURANCE FOR YOUNG DRIVERS
attributes.additional_details: With more and more young drivers wanting to be on the roads at aged 17 it is absoloutely redicilious that car insurance is costing young people around £10,000 just to insure there car, that is more then the actual car itself!   I am 16 and I am really keen on getting a car, I quit college to work full time, I do 12 hours a day most days and i've saved up quite a lot of money so far, but it feels like I will never get to my target of affording the insurance for the car. SORT THE PRICES OUT how can you possibly get a 17 year old to fork out THOUSANDS of pounds for a car insurance..
